content_blocks.title: Introduction to Digital Forensics

content.text: This lesson covers Digital evidence, Forensic process, Evidence handling, Court admissibility. You'll learn the fundamentals and practical applications.

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Think of this like Digital evidence in everyday life...
content_blocks.real_world_connection: In real-world scenarios, Digital evidence is used daily by security professionals.
content_blocks.reflection_prompt: What questions do you have about this topic?

post_assessment.question: What is digital forensics?
post_assessment.explanation: Digital forensics involves collecting, preserving, and analyzing digital evidence.
